amendment.description: Amendment strikes the $810,000 appropriation for salaries and expenses for the Office of the Under Secretary for Natural Resources and Environment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $810,000 appropriation for salaries and expenses for the Office of the Under Secretary for Natural Resources and Environment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lucas amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Lucas.
